item.title: #en @ 1440342503681527808
item.description: Each profile on DeSo is controlled solely by the user, providing unprecedented control and privacy. And because all of the data is written to the public DeSo blockchain, and the code-base is 100% open-source, DeSo is the first social network with open code and open data.

item.title: #en @ 1440020796815052808
item.description: When bus use exploded in London it wasn't fancy buses. It was simple fares (thanks Oyster card a bit after that), reliable journey times (thanks congestion charge in large part), good information (spider maps, bus stop signage, open data on maps), and frequent services.

important read by @SalGoTeam on challenges of #opendata revolution, linking to @SPIbirds example
